key.name: http-proxy
key.description: dde system http proxy, such as "http://127.0.0.1:8080/"

key.name: https-proxy
key.description: dde system https proxy, such as "https://127.0.0.1:8080/"

key.name: ftp-proxy
key.description: dde system ftp proxy, such as "ftp://127.0.0.1:8080/"

key.name: socks-proxy
key.description: dde system socks proxy, such as "socks://127.0.0.1:8080/"
